result.reason: The crash after a specific number of openings (7 times) strongly indicates a resource leak (GDI handles, User handles) or failure to properly dispose the Options form and its controls.
result.approach: Investigate the Options form for undisposed GDI objects (Fonts, Bitmaps) and ensure the form and its child controls are explicitly disposed and event handlers unsubscribed when closed.
